name: Staden under Gamlestaden
description:
Experience the town of Nya Lödöse in the early 16th century!
  • Meet the merchant, the gravedigger, the herbalist and the other town residents and help them in three different quests.
  • The game is based on knowledge that has been developed through archaeological investigations in Gamlestaden, Gothenburg.
  • Can be played both with quests and in a discovery mode with background facts.
  • Swedish audio and text only.
  • Estimated playtime between 30 to 60 minutes.
